details.title: Charge measurement circuit for electric vehicle batteries
details.abstract: Calculating the state of charge (SOC) of an electric vehicle (EV) battery is an inherently error prone process that depends on several variables. However, the accuracy of the required charge flow measurements can be greatly improved by using a voltage to frequency (V/F) converter in conjunction with a digital counter to integrate the measured battery current.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
